description:
Early Bird tickets are now on sale for Front-Trends 2017, May 24-26. Get'em while they last! https://2017.front-trends.com/ 


Front-Trends is where front-end developers and interaction designers come to stay on top of code trends and get inspired in their work. 

Front-Trends 2016 ran from May 18-20, and was the 6th annual edition with over 450 attendees, 21 speakers, 19 staffers and 16 company sponsors.
